divs: Sighting Detailswas takeing a walk when out of the east I saw 4 blinking lights 3 of them blinked Sequentially the 4th blinked out of sync from the rest. The formation was about 1 mile long with 2 lights close to each other in the front with 1 back about 4 times the distance of the first 2 and the 4th was the same distance behind, the 3rd light was alittle lower then the rest and that was the one that was out of sync. After they passed my location to the east they turned in the direction of a large thunderstorm heading northeast and the shape of the formation looked like a triangle
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lutz
There were no other sightings in Lutz on or around August 11th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 4 lights in formation flying west to east into a large thunder storm
